SUB_W07_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W07_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
This world is called Cinq. The people here
each serve the particular spirits in which
they've placed their faith, and refuse to
obey any other type.

SUB_W07_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text: Because their hearts tell them to?

SUB_W07_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W07_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
I cannot say whether such practices come from
the heart or body, or whether they are simply born
out of greed and ambition. Finding such answers sounds like a job
for Albion's National Extradimensional
Exploratory Task Force!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh, that's quite the old altar—and all signs
point it to being intentionally destroyed.
I wonder what happened here, then?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
Must be one of this world's spirits.
A fine day to ye, there.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh, don't be afraid now! I can tell from
the magical energy you're emitting there's
something ye wish to say to me. Mmm? What's this, then?
Analysis impossible?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
That was no normal spirit, for my
scanning data was unable to analyze
a fair number of its properties.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text: We've a visitor at the Soul Temple.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
A Flamewave League spy, perhaps?
I've not seen her like before.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
As if we would recruit so
ostentatious an agent!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
The Soul Temple has been the site of strange
phenomena since ancient times. Is that not
why we banded together to destroy it?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
Are you suggesting this creature is
a Soul Voyager? Are we to be ruled
by the Soul Temple even now?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
If she is indeed a Soul Voyager,
we of the Flamewave League
will not engage with her.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
And nor will we of the
Forestgale Alliance.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh dear. It seems this world is in the midst
of a power struggle between two factions—
and neither wants anything to do with me.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh, there ye are! You're willing to
accompany me here? Thanks so much,
ye wee sprite.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
I wonder if my presence
will be tolerated here.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
Be welcome at the Flame Temple,
Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
Cheers, love! Er, but what do
ye mean by 'Soul Voyager'?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
The Four Tribes of Cinq once had our lives
controlled by the Soul Temple. Eventually
we grew to despise its dominion over us,
and so banded together to destroy it.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
In the days when we were still under its sway,
travelers would occasionally appear. We named
them Soul Voyagers, for whatever they sought
would greatly affect the lives of all in Cinq.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
We know well the power of a Soul Voyager,
and humbly request your assistance in
defeating the Forestgale Alliance.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text: After the Soul Temple's destruction, the tribes of Cinq divided into two factions: the Flamewave League and the Forestgale Alliance. And while this conflict has not led to violence as yet, we remain in a state of perpetual opposition. This is why we must win.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
So please, Soul Voyager! Grant your
sacred aid to the Flamewave League!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
I need some time to think about
how I'm going to get on here.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
Take whatever time you need.
We await your favorable reply.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
I wonder if I could find my heart
in the midst of this conflict?
What do ye think, my wee sprite?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
Aye, ye're probably right. Since I don't
know where my heart could be, I'll probably
need to ally with one faction or another
if I hope to find it.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_010_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_010_C.text:
Is the Flame Temple also seeking
the aid of travelers, then?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_010_C.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_010_C.text:
Ah, so you understand the situation already.
Yes, we of the Flamewave League do indeed
seek your aid, Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLE_INTRO_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLE_INTRO_010_CUT_0.text:
What do ye think, sprite?
Am I making the right choice?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
Thank you, Soul Voyager.
Now then, if I may be so bold as to
ask, we would appreciate your help.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
Not sure if I can help,
but I'll hear ye out.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWATER_INTRO_000_.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWATER_INTRO_000_.text:
Be welcome at the Wave Temple,
Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWATER_INTRO_000_.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWATER_INTRO_000_.text: After the Soul Temple's destruction, the tribes of Cinq divided into two factions: the Waveflame League and the Forestgale Alliance. And while this conflict has not led to violence as yet, we remain in a state of perpetual opposition. This is why we must win.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWATER_INTRO_000_.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWATER_INTRO_000_.text:
So please, Soul Voyager! Grant your
sacred aid to the Waveflame League!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWATER_INTRO_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWATER_INTRO_010_.text:
Is the Wave Temple also seeking
the aid of travelers, then?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWATER_INTRO_010_.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWATER_INTRO_010_.text:
Ah, so you understand the situation already.
Yes, we of the Waveflame League do indeed
seek your aid, Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_000_C.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_000_C.text:
Be welcome at the Gale Temple,
Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_000_C.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_000_C.text:
We know well the power of a Soul Voyager,
and humbly request your assistance in
defeating the Flamewave League.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_000_C.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_000_C.text: After the Soul Temple's destruction, the tribes of Cinq divided into two factions: the Galeforest Alliance and the Flamewave League. And while this conflict has not led to violence as yet, we remain in a state of perpetual opposition. This is why we must win.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_000_C.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_000_C.text:
So please, Soul Voyager! Grant your
sacred aid to the Galeforest Alliance!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_010_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_010_C.text:
Is the Gale Temple also seeking
the aid of travelers, then?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_010_C.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_010_C.text:
Ah, so you understand the situation already.
Yes, we of the Galeforest Alliance do indeed
seek your aid, Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWOODS_INTRO_000_.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWOODS_INTRO_000_.text:
Be welcome at the Forest Temple,
Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWOODS_INTRO_000_.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWOODS_INTRO_000_.text: After the Soul Temple's destruction, the tribes of Cinq divided into two factions: the Forestgale Alliance and the Flamewave League. And while this conflict has not led to violence as yet, we remain in a state of perpetual opposition. This is why we must win.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWOODS_INTRO_000_.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWOODS_INTRO_000_.text:
So please, Soul Voyager! Grant your
sacred aid to the Forestgale Alliance!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWOODS_INTRO_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWOODS_INTRO_010_.text:
Is the Forest Temple also seeking
the aid of travelers, then?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWOODS_INTRO_010_.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWOODS_INTRO_010_.text:
Ah, so you understand the situation already.
Yes, we of the Forestgale Alliance do indeed
seek your aid, Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We must boost our economic strength
if we hope to win this war. To this end,
we are creating factories one after another,
putting a strain on our energy supply.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
As our League has heat sources and water
in abundance, we use steam as our primary
means of generating power.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Shouldn't be a problem to extract sufficient
energy from steam for a settlement of this
size. So what's the problem, then?

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
The output of our steam plant is dropping.
Should the Soul Voyager stop by, I am sure
both the problem and its solution will be
made apparent.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: Aye, all right.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_141_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_141_CUT_000_00.text:
This is the steam power plant. Harnessing
geothermal heat and vast amounts of water
can generate energy like anything.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_141_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_141_CUT_000_01.text: Mmm? Where are ye going, sprite?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_141_CUT_000_02.speaker: Nitram

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_141_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_141_CUT_000_03.text:
Sorry, love, but I don't see any problems.
Do ye have any theories as to why your
output keeps decreasing?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_141_CUT_010_00.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_141_CUT_010_00.text:
I expected no less from you, Voyager!
Those fiends are sent by the Forestgale
Alliance, and perpetually cause damage
in this place. But today, the plant remains unharmed!
Sadly for the beasts, they cannot say the same.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_141_CUT_010_01.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_141_CUT_010_01.text:
I do not expect the Forestgale Alliance
to launch another attack any time soon,
so thank you again for your efforts.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
With the issue at the steam plant resolved,
our factories can now operate at full capacity.
However, we've realized our transportation
infrastructure cannot handle the output.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We need more harbors and ships. Furthermore,
our current lack of shipyards will surely lead
to additional problems down the road.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Aye, this is a serious problem;
infrastructure affects quality of life.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I'd like to ask you to visit a shipyard
construction site, where I feel certain
your presence will cause something
quite beneficial to transpire.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Aye, but I possess no
shipbuilding functionality.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_00.text:
This is where the new shipyard
is being constructed, then.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_01.text:
Ach, again? That wee sprite doesn't
seem to enjoy the company of others.
Perhaps it's a bit misanthropic.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_02.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_02.text:
Welcome, Voyager! Your arrival will
surely hasten the construction of
this important site!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_03.text:
While this is outside my field of
expertise, I'll try to get it sorted.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_04.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_04.text:
So it seems I'm not meant to help them
build the facility, but just to watch?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_05.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_05.text:
Aye, sprite? Ye say there's
something over there?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_07.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_07.text:
The box is filled with explosives!
Fly for it, my sprite!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_08.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_08.text:
Are you all right, Voyager!?
I heard an explosion!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_09.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_09.text:
I'm fine, love—and I'm chuffed that
your workers all seem fine as well.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_10.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_10.text:
This is clearly the work of the Forestgale
Alliance—one of their spies must have
infiltrated the site. I will begin a
thorough investigation at once!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_11.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_11.text:
How did you locate that bomb,
if you don't mind my asking?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_12.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_12.text:
It appeared on one
of my sensor scans.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_13.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_000_13.text:
Well, regardless, your being here
was clearly a blessing. Thank you.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_010_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_010_00.text:
Impressive powers of perception!
But why are ye always hiding?
Do ye not like these people?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_010_01.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_010_01.text:
If you keep getting in our way, Voyager,
I'm afraid I'll have to get rid of you.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_010_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_142_CUT_010_02.text: I didn't mean to bother anyone!

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I'm given to understand that you foiled the
enemy's attempt to sabotage our new shipyard.
You Soul Voyagers truly are special beings!

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Construction of the shipyard is now complete,
offering a solution to our long-term shipping
problems. However, we would like to bring our
war with the Forestgale Alliance to a swifter end.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: With an armistice, I hope?

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
The backbone of the Forestgale Alliance's
economy is their system of railways.
Something must be done about it.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Don't tell me ye intend to
destroy their poor railway!

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
All we ask is that you visit a train
station of the Forestgale Alliance.
The rest will take care of itself.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_143_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_143_CUT_000_00.text:
This is a Forestgale railway station, then.
Using the power of nature to make a train
network is quite the engineering feat!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_143_CUT_000_01.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_143_CUT_000_01.text:
Ah, the Soul Voyager!
What are you doing here?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_143_CUT_000_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_143_CUT_000_02.text:
I heard about your railway and
came to see it for myself.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_143_CUT_000_03.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_143_CUT_000_03.text:
And I'm to believe you're here simply
for sightseeing? No, I think we'll be
escorting you during your visit.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_143_CUT_000_04.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_143_CUT_000_04.text:
If that's how ye choose to waste your
time, love, it's nothing to me. Jinks, I know that lad over there!
He's the one who sent all those fiends
after me earlier. Sure hope he didn't
hurt himself doing that.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_143_CUT_000_06.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_143_CUT_000_06.text:
I trust you've seen enough?
Perhaps it's time you departed.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_143_CUT_000_07.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_143_CUT_000_07.text:
Thank ye for seeing me out.
I found this quite enlightening.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_143_CUT_000_08.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_143_CUT_000_08.text:
Where the Voyager travels, calamity follows.
I am relieved to see that this instance
proved to be the exception to the—

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_143_CUT_000_10.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_143_CUT_000_10.text:
And we were too distracted with the Voyager
to see it coming! Damn you, Voyager!
You have brought ruin upon us!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_143_CUT_000_11.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_143_CUT_000_11.text:
Oh dear. Maybe this really was my fault?
Had the guards not been focused on me,
the saboteurs might not have been able
to do their dirty works.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_143_CUT_000_12.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_143_CUT_000_12.text:
Thank ye for trying to cheer me up.
I cannae analyze what ye are,
but it's clear ye have a heart.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Our verdant forests supply our Alliance
with an ample amount of lumber.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Sadly, we have fallen far behind in
the task of processing said lumber;
we simply cannot afford to maintain
the necessary workforce.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
So you'll be mechanizing the process,
then? Proper brilliant idea, that.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Indeed it is, which is why the tribes of Gale 
and Forest are working together to construct
a mill. However, the project is beset with
issues that I am hoping you might resolve.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
The peoples of wind and wood have begun
working together to construct a lumber mill.
However, the project is beset with issues
that I am hoping you might resolve.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Construction is outside of my field
of expertise, but I'll do my best to
help ye however I can.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_231_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_231_CUT_000_00.text:
This appears to be where they're building the
lumberyard, but I don't see any construction.
Got loads of workers and materials, though.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_231_CUT_000_02.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_231_CUT_000_02.text:
I am pleased to see you come, Voyager. Alas,
those of the Gale Tribe who are supposed to
be helping us construct the mill refuse to work. Might I ask you to scold them in my stead?
While they ignore me, they'll not so easily
shrug off a rebuke from a Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_231_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_231_CUT_000_03.text:
Don't know if I can convince them,
but I'm willing to hear them out.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_231_CUT_000_04.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_231_CUT_000_04.text:
The work is just too dangerous! These woods
are filled with all manner of horrid beasts,
and they're perpetually waiting for a chance
to make us their dinner! We tried telling the Forest Tribe that you can't
build a mill when you're always looking over
your shoulder, but they don't seem to care!
I simply don't understand their kind...

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_231_CUT_000_05.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_231_CUT_000_05.text:
Oh, that's a sad state of affairs, it is.
I'll go look into your conditions, but meanwhile,
probably best that ye ask the forest people
how they stay safe with all this.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_231_CUT_000_07.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_231_CUT_000_07.text:
To the Forest Tribe, beasts of the wood are
treasured neighbors with whom we coexist. And while we do eat them at times, our hunting
season is primarily for population control.
We cannot simply slaughter them indiscriminately
to ease the nerves of some cowardly gale people!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_231_CUT_000_08.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_231_CUT_000_08.text:
The creature I saw in the woods
was no beast, but a fiend.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_231_CUT_000_09.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_231_CUT_000_09.text: Hmm. We have sensed a disturbing decline in the beasts' numbers of late, so perhaps this is the reason. Which means... Of course! Those villains from the Flamewave League must be releasing fiends into our woods! Might I ask you to cull the numbers of these interlopers, Voyager?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_231_CUT_010_00.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_231_CUT_010_00.text:
Now the Gale Tribe can
work without fear.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_231_CUT_010_01.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_231_CUT_010_01.text:
I can't believe the Flamewave League was behind
those monsters! They very nearly managed to
cause strife between us and the Forest Tribe,
and they will pay dearly for it!

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Thanks to the new mill, we'll be able to
finish some large-scale construction
projects that were on hold.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Our next project is instilling wind turbines in
the Gale Tribe's residential district. If we can
complete that, the Alliance's energy production
will finally be comparable to that of the League.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I cannae claim to have ever
installed a turbine before.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Ah, no. That is not the task we had in mind,
Voyager. Rather, we expect the League to
attempt sabotage, for there's no low their
kind won't sink to.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Our next project is installing wind turbines
in the Gale Tribe's residential district.
But we expect the League to attempt sabotage,
for there's no low their kind won't sink to.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: I wonder why ye expect that.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_232_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_232_CUT_000_00.text:
This project is a wee bit larger in scale
than I anticipated. But once the area is
filled to bursting with turbines, the energy
shortfall should take care of itself.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_232_CUT_000_01.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_232_CUT_000_01.text:
Yes, and the greater the project,
the harder it is to defend. We've already had a rash of suspicious fires
that destroyed precious materials recently
delivered from the mill. Without a doubt,
this is the work of the Flamewave League.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_232_CUT_000_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_232_CUT_000_02.text:
Bit early to jump to that conclusion,
love, but I'll guard it as best I can.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_232_CUT_000_05.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_232_CUT_000_05.text:
While the saboteurs are relentless,
we've no proof they're from the
Flamewave League.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_232_CUT_000_06.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_232_CUT_000_06.text:
Thanks to you, our materials are safe,
and construction is proceeding smoothly.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_232_CUT_000_07.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_232_CUT_000_07.text:
The wind farm should be complete soon.
I hope there's no further incidents.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_232_CUT_000_09.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_232_CUT_000_09.text: Fiend! A giant fiend is coming!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_232_CUT_010_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_232_CUT_010_00.text:
I cannae say whether or not the Flamewave
League was involved in the attacks.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_232_CUT_010_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_232_CUT_010_01.text:
Aye, but I'm glad we were able
to protect all the workers.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Various industries have been reaping the
benefit of the Alliance's new wind energy,
and our economic prospects seem bright.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Sadly, while we strive to live in greater harmony
with nature than the Flamewave League, this has
put us at a disadvantage in the war.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Even with our recent gains,
our loss is inevitable.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Your tribe clearly possesses ample land
and natural resources, so why is it ye
feel the need to fight over everything?

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Our only option would be to attack the enemy's
infrastructure. If we can destroy their port,
we will deal a great blow to their economy.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I don't understand what ye
hope to gain from this war.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_233_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_233_CUT_000_00.text:
I'm only here because I'm a wee bit curious
why they keep waging war. Thinking maybe
there's some factor I failed to account for.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_233_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_233_CUT_000_01.text:
Are ye able to understand what I don't,
sprite? Is that why ye flee from them?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_233_CUT_000_02.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_233_CUT_000_02.text:
You have come, Voyager—
just as our intelligence predicted.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_233_CUT_000_03.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_233_CUT_000_03.text:
We know you are planning to destroy the port,
and I will not allow it! Your meddling will cause
no harm to the League today!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_233_CUT_000_04.speaker: Diva_No5

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_233_CUT_000_05.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_233_CUT_000_05.text:
Cease your mumbling! Now then, tell me who sent you and
why you have come. I need to hear
a confession from your own lips.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_233_CUT_000_06.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_233_CUT_000_06.text:
I sorry I failed to protect ye.
Truly I am.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.text:
Our long war is finally over!
The Flamewave League stands victorious!

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.text:
Our League has proven its dominance
thanks to the Soul Voyager!

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.text:
Should your travels bring you to this
world again, please do visit our temple.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.text:
They all seem rather chuffed, but I cannae
understand why. Oh, but these people are
ever so confusing to me...

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.text:
Ye want me to continue serving as their
Soul Voyager, then? You think that'll
finally lead to my heart?

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.text: Nae, I think I'm done here.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.text: Aye, I'll be the Voyager a bit longer.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.text:
Our long war is finally over!
The Forestgale Alliance stands victorious!

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.text:
Our Alliance has proven its dominance
thanks to the Soul Voyager!

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.text:
Should your travels bring you to this
world again, please do visit our temple.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.text:
The war's over and still don't understand
what it is they were fighting for.
Their hearts are such a mystery!

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.text: Do ye have any insights, sprite?

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.text:
Aye? Ye do understand their hearts?
And ye say I will too if I keep playing
the Soul Voyager a wee bit longer?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.text:
You have come at an opportune time,
Soul Voyager!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.text:
Ye still have problems, then?
Even though the war's over?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.text:
The war is far from over, I fear. In fact,
we now suspect the Wave Tribe intends to
attack. Therefore, we must make a proactive
move, lest we yield the initiative.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.text:
But the Flame and Wave Tribes are allies!
Ye got no reason to be turning on each
other like that.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.text:
As much as I wish it could have continued,
the Wave Temple sees things differently,
and has decreed our people can never be one.
Knowing this, I ask you to aid us!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.text:
Aye, I'll need a wee bit of time
to think this whole mess over.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.text:
Take whatever time you need.
We await your favorable reply.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.text:
It's the same as before! They're all offering
mad accusations without evidence.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.text:
Yet it appears I must ally with one or
the other if I wish to find my heart.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_01.text:
Don't tell me the Flame Temple
shares the same intentions?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_01.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_01.text:
We are resolved to launch an attack
on the Wave Tribe, Voyager, and would
much appreciate your aid.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWATER_BETRAYAL_0.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWATER_BETRAYAL_0.text:
The war is far from over, I fear. In fact,
we now suspect the Flame Tribe intends to
attack. Therefore, we must make a proactive
move, lest we yield the initiative.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWATER_BETRAYAL_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWATER_BETRAYAL_0.text:
But the Wave and Flame Tribes are allies!
Ye got no reason to be turning on each
other like that.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWATER_BETRAYAL_0.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWATER_BETRAYAL_0.text:
As much as I wish it could have continued,
the Flame Temple sees things differently,
and has decreed our people can never be one.
Knowing this, I ask you to aid us!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWATER_BETRAYAL_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWATER_BETRAYAL_0.text:
Don't tell me the Wave Temple
shares the same intentions?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWATER_BETRAYAL_0.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWATER_BETRAYAL_0.text:
We are resolved to launch an attack
on the Flame Tribe, Voyager, and would
much appreciate your aid.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWIND_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWIND_BETRAYAL_00.text:
The war is far from over, I fear. In fact,
we now suspect the Forest Tribe intends to
attack. Therefore, we must make a proactive
move, lest we yield the initiative.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWIND_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWIND_BETRAYAL_00.text:
It makes no sense to turn on each
other now. Why not keep cooperating
as ye have been?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWIND_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWIND_BETRAYAL_00.text:
As much as I wish it could have continued,
the Forest Temple sees things differently,
and claims the forest has no need of wind.
Knowing this, I ask you to aid us!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWIND_BETRAYAL_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWIND_BETRAYAL_01.text:
Don't tell me the Gale Temple
shares the same intentions?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWIND_BETRAYAL_01.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWIND_BETRAYAL_01.text:
We are resolved to launch an attack
on the Forest Tribe, Voyager, and would
much appreciate your aid.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWOODS_BETRAYAL_0.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWOODS_BETRAYAL_0.text:
The war is far from over, I fear. In fact,
we now suspect the Gale Tribe intends to
attack. Therefore, we must make a proactive
move, lest we yield the initiative.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWOODS_BETRAYAL_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWOODS_BETRAYAL_0.text:
It makes no sense to turn on each
other now. Why not keep cooperating
as ye have been?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWOODS_BETRAYAL_0.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWOODS_BETRAYAL_0.text:
As much as I wish it could have continued,
the Gale Temple sees things differently,
and declared the woods an obstacle to wind.
Knowing this, I ask you to aid us!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWOODS_BETRAYAL_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWOODS_BETRAYAL_0.text:
Don't tell me the Forest Temple
shares the same intentions?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWOODS_BETRAYAL_0.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLEWOODS_BETRAYAL_0.text:
We are resolved to launch an attack
on the Gale Tribe, Voyager, and would
much appreciate your aid.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We were able to claim victory in our war
against the Forestgale Alliance due to our
superior energy production.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
And now ye intend to build
a second steam energy plant?

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
No. That would take far too long, causing
us to fall behind in the war against the
wave people. Instead, we seek to upgrade
our current plant.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Then why not just add more rotor blades to each
turbine to generate electricity more efficiently?
Here, let's start by making a thorough analysis
of your steam flow rate, all right, love?

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I ask only that you visit the plant.
That should ensure all goes smoothly.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: It seems my ideas are unwelcome.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_101_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_101_CUT_000_00.text:
The energy generated by this steam plant
is provided to the Wave Tribe as well.
Aye, but it's a potent symbol of the
cooperation between the two tribes.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_101_CUT_000_01.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_101_CUT_000_01.text:
And yet, their incessant harassment
has completely stalled our plans
to upgrade the power plant.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_101_CUT_000_03.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_101_CUT_000_03.text:
Indeed. They loose monsters near the cooling
pools, which both endangers our staff and
reduces the plant's efficiency.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_101_CUT_000_04.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_101_CUT_000_04.text:
If there are fiends that need slaying,
I'd be happy to help.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_101_CUT_010_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_101_CUT_010_00.text:
I can see how these fiends are difficult for
your people to deal with, but that doesn't
prove the Wave Tribe sent them.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_101_CUT_010_01.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_101_CUT_010_01.text:
While you have my gratitude, Voyager,
you know little of the Wave Tribe.
They are indeed set on annihilating
our kind!

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We wish to make use of various minerals
which can be obtained from volcanoes.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
And you'll craft things with 'em using
the energy from your steam plant, then?

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
You seem to understand a great deal
about our technology, Voyager.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Aye, indeed—in fact, there are ways to further
enhance your energy production using only the
resources ye already possess! I'd be happy to
demonstrate this if ye like.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Thank you, but no. We will use our energy to power
our forges, which will allow us to make ever more
potent weapons and lead us to victory!

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Thank you, but no. We will use our energy to power
our forges, which will allow us to make ever more
potent weapons and lead us to victory!

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: Sorry if I spoke out of turn, love.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_102_CUT_000_01.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_102_CUT_000_01.text:
What you are feeling is the heat from the
volcano mingling with our fiery enthusiasm
for these ironworks.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_102_CUT_000_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_102_CUT_000_02.text:
This level of heat won't affect my
functionality. Ye should remain here.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_102_CUT_000_03.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_102_CUT_000_03.text:
The fire fiends here don't like our presence.
And while we're not afraid of their attacks,
per se, we also haven't figured out an
effective strategy to combat them.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_102_CUT_010_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_102_CUT_010_00.text:
I managed to slay the fiends,
despite the heat.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_102_CUT_010_01.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_102_CUT_010_01.text:
Thank you! Now we can finish the
ironworks without further incident.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We have arrived at a decision, Voyager:
we are going to destroy the shipyard
that once stood as a proud symbol
of the Flamewave League's unity.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: Oh, but why!?

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
The psychological damage it will deal
to the Wave Tribe is the best way to
ensure a rapid victory against them.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Well, destroyed infrastructure can be rebuilt—
but if ye do this, the destruction of the League
will be irreversible. Is that really what ye want
here, love?

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We will win this war with or without
your assistance, Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_103_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_103_CUT_000_00.text:
Are they really going to destroy
the shipyard, then?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_103_CUT_000_01.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_103_CUT_000_01.text:
I understand how you must feel, Voyager,
seeing as you once risked your life in defense
of the shipyard. But there is no other choice
left to us.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_103_CUT_000_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_103_CUT_000_02.text:
Whatever drives them to turn on each other is
something I lack. Is it part of having a heart,
then? What do ye think?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_103_CUT_010_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_103_CUT_010_00.text:
All that time and effort to build it,
and only an instant to destroy it.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_103_CUT_010_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_103_CUT_010_01.text:
If this war sprung out of their hearts,
then I wonder if I should bother finding
my own heart at all.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.text:
We have destroyed all the enemy
temples thanks to your good work.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.text:
The Flame people saw all the
other tribes as enemies, then?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.text:
No, of course not. Regardless, now that only
the Flame Temple remains, we can finally
cover the entirety of Cinq with magma.
Then only we will remain!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.text:
You have served us well, Soul Voyager,
and I wish to grant you tribute.
What is it you desire?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.text: Tell me of the Flame Tribe's heart.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.text:
The heart of the Flame people is fire.
Extinguish it, and we are no more—
which is why we must burn for eternity. I would think you of all people should
understand that, Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Our transportation infrastructure gives us an
advantage over the Flame Tribe, for we can move
more on our waterways than on any land route—
so long as we have the ships, that is.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
You intend to build
another shipyard, then?

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
No. That would take far too long, causing
us to fall behind in the war against the
Flame Tribe. Instead, we seek to upgrade
our current one.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Oh, then you should redesign it to be even
more efficient! I think a few wee changes
to your production and material management
would provide a serious boost in output.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I ask only that you visit the shipyard.
That should ensure all goes smoothly.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: Aye. Sorry if I spoke out of turn.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_401_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_401_CUT_000_00.text:
This is an impressive shipyard;
I'm glad they finished it safely.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_401_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_401_CUT_000_01.text:
I'm quite eager to see how they
intend to improve it, though.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_401_CUT_000_02.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_401_CUT_000_02.text:
While our shipyard is capable of producing
large-scale vessels, its facilities are
lacking due to its hasty construction
in the midst of the war. And since building large vessels is an
inefficient process at the best of times,
we must see this situation rectified.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_401_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_401_CUT_000_03.text:
I understand you're constrained in both time
and space, but I'd be happy to look around
and suggest a few possible improvements.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_401_CUT_000_04.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_401_CUT_000_04.text: Ha ha! We certainly do not expect your help with that, Voyager. We have specialists in that field arriving any min—

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_401_CUT_010_00.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_401_CUT_010_00.text:
You truly have a knack for being where
you are needed most, Voyager.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_401_CUT_010_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_401_CUT_010_01.text: Was I being praised just now?

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Our waterways are now so crowded that
we fear the possibility of a collision.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: Oh, that's a dire problem indeed.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We intend to construct a lighthouse
and highlight safe shipping routes.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Aye, a lighthouse should greatly reduce the
risk of shipping accidents. I hope ye might
grant me a tour when it's done.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Actually, I would prefer
that you go see it now.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I would like you to visit the
lighthouse construction site.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Ye fear an incident of some sort?
Very well, I'll go.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_402_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_402_CUT_000_00.text:
So this is where the lighthouse is to
be built? I see no signs of trouble.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_402_CUT_000_01.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_402_CUT_000_01.text:
Oh, there's trouble all right: fiends are
keeping us from building the lighthouse.
Indeed, it's hard to imagine it ever being
completed under these conditions.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_402_CUT_000_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_402_CUT_000_02.text:
Were these fiends loosed here
by the Flame Temple, then?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_402_CUT_000_03.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_402_CUT_000_03.text:
No, in fact—these appear to be native
creatures who simply don't appreciate
what we're doing in their territory.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_402_CUT_000_04.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_402_CUT_000_04.text:
Aye, if that's the case,
I'll do what I can to help.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_402_CUT_010_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_402_CUT_010_00.text: How much longer must I fight?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_402_CUT_010_01.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_402_CUT_010_01.text:
The fiends should calm down once
construction is finished and we
vacate the area.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_402_CUT_010_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_402_CUT_010_02.text: This battle is a long one.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We have arrived at a decision, Voyager:
we are going to destroy the steam plant
that once stood as a proud symbol of
the Waveflame League's unity.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Won't that harm the
Wave Tribe as well?

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Yes, but it is still the best way to ensure
a rapid victory against the Flame Tribe.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I don't see the point of sacrificing one's
own prosperity for the sake of war.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: No one asked for your opinion.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_403_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_403_CUT_000_00.text:
How do ye intend to destroy
the steam plant, then?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_403_CUT_000_01.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_403_CUT_000_01.text:
If the pressure of the steam exceeds
a certain level, the plant will explode.
Accidents do happen, after all.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_403_CUT_000_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_403_CUT_000_02.text:
And how is it an accident if the
Wave Temple knows of it in advance?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_403_CUT_000_03.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_403_CUT_000_03.text:
Everyone knows about the potential for
accidents. If this one causes excessive
damage, it will be on the Flame Tribe for
not taking proper precautions.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_403_CUT_000_04.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_403_CUT_000_04.text:
Ye seek to blame the Flame Tribe
for your own actions, then?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_400_CUT_000_0.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_400_CUT_000_0.text:
As the Wave Tribe cannot survive for long in
the open air, we have no intentions of stealing
the lands of others. All we desire is for all to
live in peace within their own territories.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_400_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_400_CUT_000_0.text:
Then why wage war on the
other tribes at all?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_400_CUT_000_0.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_400_CUT_000_0.text: Because they looked to conquer us! No, the peace we sought could only be secured through the destruction of all other temples.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_400_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_400_CUT_000_0.text: Tell me of the Wave Tribe's heart.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_400_CUT_000_0.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_400_CUT_000_0.text:
Just as water fills the shape of a container,
the Wave Tribe fills whatever mold we must.
If others seek peace, we are beings of peace.
If they seek war, we provide that as well. You of all people should understand
this, Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We must increase our energy capacity without
attracting attention from the Forest Tribe.
To this end, we seek to upgrade our output
of wind energy.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Ye will mask your upgrades as
routine maintenance, then?

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Yes, exactly so! Ah, but it is a relief
to have your keen insight on our side,
Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I suspect the Forest Tribe
will notice regardless.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Yes, I agree. In fact, they are certain
to come here and investigate our dealings,
and I am at a loss for how to deter them.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Might I ask you to visit the wind farm?
I have no desire to risk trouble between
our peoples at this point.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: Understood.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_301_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_301_CUT_000_00.text:
There are loads of Forest people here.
Clearly this facility is quite important
to them as well.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_301_CUT_000_01.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_301_CUT_000_01.text:
It will be impossible to replace the
components necessary to boost our output
with so many people watching, Voyager.
What is to be done?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_301_CUT_000_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_301_CUT_000_02.text:
Well, if there were a big to-do nearby,
the Forest people may not be able to
concentrate on whatever you were doing.
Something like a fiend attack, maybe?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_301_CUT_000_03.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_301_CUT_000_03.text:
An interesting thought... Yet while the
Forest Tribe would certainly pay us little
mind during a fiend attack, it would also
place our workers in grave danger.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_301_CUT_000_04.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_301_CUT_000_04.text:
Not to worry, love!
I'll keep everyone safe as houses.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_301_CUT_010_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_301_CUT_010_00.text:
I wasn't expecting ye to send
quite so many fiends there!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_301_CUT_010_01.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_301_CUT_010_01.text:
We may have gotten carried away a bit,
and for this, I apologize. But surely
they were no more than a minor
inconvenience for you, Voyager?

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
As there has been no change to the Forest
Tribe's supply of energy, they currently
suspect nothing. We must use this chance
to strengthen our own position.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Aye, strength training is an important
component of overall health.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We intend to take measures such as increasing
food production in order to become fully self-
sufficient. In this way, we can continue the
war even after the forest people cut off trade.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Regardless of the conflict, greater
self-sufficiency will be a positive
thing for the Gale Tribe. Is there
some way I can help you, then?

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WindPriest
WindPriest
Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Aye, that's a proper problem.
I'll go take a look.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_302_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_302_CUT_000_00.text:
The word 'farm' led me to expect fields,
but I'm seeing barns instead. Guess a
facility of this size raises a rather
significant amount of livestock.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_302_CUT_000_01.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_302_CUT_000_01.text:
With our wind power, even a small amount of
people can raise a large amount of livestock.
These will be used not only for consumption,
but for trade with other regions as well.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_302_CUT_000_03.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_302_CUT_000_03.text:
Barns are of little use with no livestock to
fill them—but before we can gather our herds
from the pastures, we must deal with the
various fiends in the area.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_302_CUT_000_04.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_302_CUT_000_04.text:
So ye need fiends slain?
That's a thing I can help with.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_302_CUT_010_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_302_CUT_010_00.text:
I exterminated all the nearby fiends,
but I'll leave all the livestock to ye,
as my talents don't extend to that area.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_302_CUT_010_01.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_302_CUT_010_01.text:
Thank you, Voyager! Without your help,
we would be up for a severe tongue-lashing
from our leaders at the temple.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_302_CUT_010_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_302_CUT_010_02.text:
Then this wasn't for the good
of the Gale Tribe in general?

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
The Forest Tribe are completely oblivious,
and one small push may be all it takes to
win their surrender. As such, I intend to
attack their lumber mill.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: You're planning a surprise attack?

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Such an attack is the best way to
minimize damage on both sides,
and therefore the optimal strategy.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Your people's obsession with trickery
and deception feels a wee bit excessive.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
No one is asking you to participate
in the attack, Soul Voyager!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_303_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_303_CUT_000_00.text:
The Gale and Forest Tribes worked together
to build this sawmill, and now ye want to
be wrecking it?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_303_CUT_000_01.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_303_CUT_000_01.text:
We worked ourselves near to death in this forest,
yet the Forest Tribe never made any effort to
understand our ways. For us, this place holds
naught but painful memories.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_300_CUT_000_0.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_300_CUT_000_0.text:
Now we can finally raze this terrible forest!
We will turn it from a terrifying den of beasts
into a peaceful grassland savanna—for one cannot
live on lava and water, nor grow crops there.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_300_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_300_CUT_000_0.text:
When all the forests are gone,
there'll be no more wind to blow.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_300_CUT_000_0.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_300_CUT_000_0.text:
There will still be trees, Voyager—there is
simply no need for such dense forestland.
All that matters is the wind blowing through
the new grassy plains.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_300_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_300_CUT_000_0.text: Tell me of the Gale Tribe's heart.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_300_CUT_000_0.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_300_CUT_000_0.text:
The heart of the Gale people is wind.
Always moving, gentle at times, yet violent
at times as well. I think you of all people
should understand this, Soul Traveler.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
How are we to defend ourselves from an assault by
the Gale Tribe? Alas, while we of the Forest Tribe
cannot match their strength, we've no choice but
to throw away our lives in the effort.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Have ye tried talking to the Gale Tribe?
I find dialogue is often necessary to
establish mutual understanding.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Yes, we will definitely try that...
and afterward, we will optimize the
lumber mill! That is our only hope.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Oh, but I'm an expert at
efficiency optimization!

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I would appreciate you going to the mill,
for I know your presence will bring
great cheer to all the workers.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I would appreciate you going to the mill,
for I know your presence will bring
great cheer to all the workers.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_201_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_201_CUT_000_00.text:
Gosh, but there's loads of Forest people
gathered around the mill. What happened?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_201_CUT_000_01.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_201_CUT_000_01.text:
We laid off laborers who will no longer be
needed due to the mill upgrades, and now
they're interfering with the process! We even offered to find them new jobs,
but they refuse to listen.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_201_CUT_000_02.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_201_CUT_000_02.text:
We may have to take stronger
measures to remove them.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_201_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_201_CUT_000_03.text:
I cannae say I care for
the sound of that...

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_201_CUT_000_04.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_201_CUT_000_04.text:
Look out! Some of the fiends the
Flamewave League sent are still alive!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_201_CUT_010_00.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_201_CUT_010_00.text:
With the former workers scattered,
we can now upgrade the mill.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_201_CUT_010_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_201_CUT_010_01.text:
So those 'stronger measures' then...
Nae, I'm sure that was a coincidence.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Our talks with the Gale Tribe did nothing
but heighten suspicions. We should never
have engaged with them at all.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I apologize if my proposal
served ye poorly.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
In response, we've formed a cavalry composed
of workers who were made redundant by the mill
upgrade. That should allow us to match the
speed of the gale peoples' forces.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Then ye will need to build
stables for them, aye?

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
You guess correctly. As such, we would ask
you to visit the construction site, as we
anticipate interference from the Gale Tribe.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We would ask you to visit the construction
site of the stables, as we anticipate
interference from the Gale Tribe.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: Understood.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_202_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_202_CUT_000_00.text:
I wonder if the Gale Tribe truly intends 
to interfere? Tensions seem high between
the two of them, so I suppose it's not
entirely out of the question.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_202_CUT_000_01.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_202_CUT_000_01.text:
The wind blows in a strange direction today... 
I wonder if the Gale Tribe is using it to send
some fell beast after us.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_202_CUT_010_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_202_CUT_010_00.text:
Ye have no proof the Gale Tribe sent
those fiends. They could have simply
flown in of their own accord.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_202_CUT_010_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_202_CUT_010_02.text: Aye, I'm not certain—but I certainly want it to be true.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
The Gale Tribe derives its strength
from the energy of their wind farm.
Without it, they are powerless.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Don't tell me ye intend
to destroy it, then?

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
The Gale Tribe uses its mastery of the breezes
to send countless fiends after us. We have no
option but to destroy the farm—although I do not
know if we actually possess the power to do so.

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
But your people will also suffer if
ye destroy their energy supply!

SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_DIVA_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
That is of no concern. So long as we
have our forests, we can survive.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_203_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_203_CUT_000_00.text:
It took so much work to build this farm.
Is destroying it truly necessary?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_203_CUT_000_01.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_MISSION_203_CUT_000_01.text:
We will set the wind farm to burn.
If we are slain in the effort,
I leave the fate of the Forest Tribe
in your hands, Voyager. Farewell.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_200_CUT_000_0.text:
The strength of the Gale Temple has been
reduced to nothing, and we can now live
lives free of worry. All praise to the forests, for they will
now spread unchecked across all of Cinq,
realizing our dream of a green world!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_200_CUT_000_0.text:
That will be a very different Cinq.
But what of the other tribes?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_200_CUT_000_0.text:
The other peoples do not yet know the worth
of the forest. Once they see how wonderful
it is to make one's home among the canopy
of trees, they will come to see things our way.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_200_CUT_000_0.text: Tell me of the Forest Tribe's heart.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_200_CUT_000_0.text:
The heart of the Forest people is the woods.
A forest is more than just single trees;
it is everything from the flowers of its
glades to the animals within. I should think you of all people
might understand this, Soul Traveler.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_000_0.text:
I was finally able to reach my heart,
but at the expense of the other tribes.
Must there be conflict to find a heart,
then? Was this truly the proper choice?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_000_0.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_000_0.text:
It seems you've had quite a precious experience
here! But alas, our work for Albion's National
Extradimensional Exploratory Task Force is not
yet done, so we must hurry on to the next world.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_000_0.speaker: SoulSprite
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_000_0.text:
That is up to you, O Soul Voyager.
O Songstress.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
When I said I needed nothing, it was because I
thought there was no more useful information
to be gained from that person. But now I think
something else may have been affecting me.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
Surely the fluctuation in your judgment was a
base function of your robotic core—likely one
meant to let you glean accurate conclusions in
spite of biased information. Well done indeed!

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: SoulSprite
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
Was that not in fact your heart,
O Soul Voyager? O Songstress?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
Ye can speak normally then, sprite!?
Oh, and the aspects of ye I couldn't
analyze are gone—is that why you're
able to speak freely, then?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
But to your question, that is different
from a heart. That cannae be my heart.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: SoulSprite
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
It was all as your heart desired,
O Soul Voyager. O Songstress.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
A great crowd of people from the
four tribes are advancing on the temple.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
All the temples have been destroyed!
Is all of this happening because I
said I needed nothing, then!?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: SoulSprite
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
All has been returned to the point from
which it began. The Four Tribes will now
begin anew—and will continue to do so
as many times as it takes.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
Let's stack these stones
at the Soul Temple.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
If we all work together,
we can rebuild the Soul Temple.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
All those of the Four Tribes
possess a soul.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text: May all our souls be as one.

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: SoulSprite
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
Continue your journey without fear,
O Soul Voyager. O Songstress.
Do you wish to take someone with you?

SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_EVAR_DIVA_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_1.text: Who are ye, my spirit of souls?

SUB_W07_WRLD_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_WRLD_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, but I failed to understand the
hearts of this world's people.

SUB_W07_WRLD_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W07_WRLD_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
If you could discover a heart that easily,
what would be the point of the National
Extradimensional Exploratory Task Force?
Right then! On to the next world!

SUB_W07_WRLD_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W07_WRLD_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Is it really okay to leave things like this?
Oh, and I never did manage to successfully
analyze ye, sprite. I'm so sorry for that.
